testcase.name: To verify Login functionality with valid username and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given user is in the Deals direct home page.................................passed When user mouse over to Person icon.........................................passed When user clicked my details in the drop down list preset in the person icon.passed Then user is in the signup and signin Taskpage..............................passed When user clicked the signin tab............................................passed And user entered valid "acchuthantm@gmail.com" and valid "Acchu123".........passed And user entered sigin button...............................................passed Then The user navigated to the next page....................................passed
